snippet.title: Street Fighter 6 - Akuma Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Akuma will unleash his rage on foes worthy enough to face him on May 22. Will you harness the power of the Satsui no Hado or succumb to the inner demon?

Owners of the Deluxe and Ultimate Edition or the Year 1 Character Pass and Ultimate Pass for Street Fighter 6 will obtain Akuma immediately when he releases. Year 1 Ultimate Pass owners will also receive the new stage, Enma's Hollow.

Beware the effects of the Satsui no Hado lest you become tormented by its hunger.

With the Akuma update comes a major balance patch where all characters will receive changes. Keep an eye out on our social channels for more details.

https://streetfighter.com/6/

#StreetFighter #Capcom #Akuma

Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/streetfighter
Discord: https://discord.gg/streetfighter
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/streetfightergame/
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/streetfighter
Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/capcomfighters
